QuestData.Title: The Rattle of Bones
QuestData.Description: A tauren rattle lays here, exuding supernatural power. Its keepers slain, the artifact is undefended.$B$BSurely the brave will have some insight into its significance?
QuestData.LogDescription: Give the Rattle of Bones to the Freewind Brave at Darkcloud Pinnacle in Thousand Needles.
QuestData.RewardText: It is true then! What is it doing here, though? And if it is here, that must mean that the writ and the drums are also nearby!$B$BPerhaps there is some link between it and the wind serpent that just appeared? I think that I have an idea what that creature is as well.
